sentences.english: And this should allow me to make nice contact out of the bunker.
sentences.chinese: 这样就可以让我非常扎实地去触球，将球打出沙坑。

sentences.english: They also love playing with their trucks, shovels and buckets in the sandbox.
sentences.chinese: 他们也喜欢在沙坑里玩卡车，铲子，和水桶。

sentences.english: The children scooped holes in the sand.
The green is large and well bunkered, so be sure and take aim at the right spot.
sentences.chinese: 果岭很大，又被大沙坑包围着，要确信朝右边瞄准。

sentences.english: The green, pinched in the front by the penetrating bunkers, angles away from the golfers approach.
sentences.chinese: 通过渗透式沙坑挤压在前方的果岭进行近距离切球。

sentences.english: Round sandboxes are placed between the asphalt terraces and the grass.
sentences.chinese: 圆形沙坑设置于沥青露天和草地之间。

sentences.english: Sam That was an amazing chip shot out of the bunker .
sentences.chinese: 山姆那记打出沙坑的起扑球真是太神奇了。

sentences.english: From here to the bunker is one hundred and eighty yards.
sentences.chinese: 从这里到那一个沙坑是一百八十码。

sentences.english: A players tee shot comes to rest in a bunker in front of the putting green.
sentences.chinese: 一名球员把球发到了果岭前面的沙坑里。

sentences.english: The weight shift in sand may be a little less than a regular fairway shot.
sentences.chinese: 在沙坑的重心转移比在球道上击球时略少一些。

sentences.english: This is the hole after tree removal and rebunkering.
sentences.chinese: 这张是该洞树木移除和沙坑重建后的效果图。

sentences.english: Rory McIlroy watches a bunker shot during practice July 14.
sentences.chinese: 罗里麦克罗伊手表在练习沙坑杆7月14日。

sentences.english: Out my left window, Libya looks like one huge sandbox.
sentences.chinese: 机舱外的利比亚就像一个巨大的沙坑。

sentences.english: A pl ayers ball is lying on gr ass-covered ground within a bunker.
sentences.chinese: 一名球员的球停在了沙坑里有草覆盖的地方。

sentences.english: Walking a few yards from the pit, I kicked disgustedly at the dirt.
sentences.chinese: 我从沙坑里走出几码远，气愤地踢着沙土。

sentences.english: Steve Marino plays a bunker shot during a practice round June 16.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫马里诺在一次次练习赛6月16日一沙坑杆。

definition: sandpit (for children's play or for long jump etc)/sandbox
sandy beach or river bank/sand dune/sandy land
Shenkeng township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
